reviews.Title: Really Nice
reviews.Comment:
I have been a samsung patron until Note 5. The flip design attracted me. Debated between flip 5 and razor ultra and went with flip, Lavender color. It is a bit heavy phone and slippery too. Ordered Spigen cases but had to return due to their slippery nature. Went with Samsung flipsuit case, expensive but found it gives a better grip.

As for the phone, it needs improvement. Especially in the transition from the front screen to the inside screen. A software update could help overcome. ...

reviews.Title: Great product
reviews.Comment:
Writing review after 1month usage. Phone design is good, display and camera are excellent. UI is very smooth no lags at all. Performance is very good. Battery charging time is very long it takes 2.30mis to charge fully we will get about a day with moderate to heavy usage. Face recognition works fine but finger print does not work properly.
Pros : Design 5*, Display 5*, Camera 5*, performance 5*
Cons : Battery 4*, finger print 1*
They should have provided with back case

reviews.Title: Perfect product!
reviews.Comment: Review after one week. Phone looks brilliant. Took me to older days where flip phone was there. Build Quality is good. Camera looks decent. Battery backup is average for a heavy usage. But nice one by samsung. Love the way they build the phone. Outer display seems to be really good with small display in it. Disappointment: Charger not available. Overall got it for a good deal.

Got it for 68k effective, 5k for previous phone and 12k for exchange bonus and rest bank offer. I've to say the functionality of the cover screen while using camera is good. But the cover screen display is not like Android, it has very limited functionality which I hate a lot. Screen brightness is a biggest issue while using outside. Battery backup is very low and the UI lags sometimes with snapdragon 8 gen 2. I liked OneUI though. No charger provided is a biggest con and expensive cases. Gro...
